languages.text: "Твоя решимость сияет всеми оттенками золота, сестра! Такие пламенные слова и столь истовая вера в них... Что невозможно смотреть, не щурясь".
"Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."
languages.original_text: "Твоя решимость сияет всеми оттенками золота, сестра! Такие пламенные слова и столь истовая вера в них... Что невозможно смотреть, не щурясь".

traits.locale_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你的决心闪耀着黄金般的光芒，修女！你的誓言像烈焰一样熊熊燃烧，而你坚定不移地相信着它……如此耀眼，我不得不眯起眼睛来看。”
languages.original_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."

traits.locale_text: “你的决心闪耀着黄金般的光芒，修女！你的誓言像烈焰一样熊熊燃烧，而你坚定不移地相信着它……如此耀眼，我不得不眯起眼睛来看。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Votre résolution resplendit de mille nuances dorées, ma sœur ! Et vos paroles flamboient tel un feu incandescent. Votre foi inébranlable est presque aveuglante. »
languages.original_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."

traits.locale_text: « Votre résolution resplendit de mille nuances dorées, ma sœur ! Et vos paroles flamboient tel un feu incandescent. Votre foi inébranlable est presque aveuglante. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Su resolución brilla con todos los tonos del oro, hermana! Sus palabras arden como el fuego y su fe en ellas es inquebrantable... apenas puedo mirarla sin tener que cerrar los ojos».
languages.original_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."

traits.locale_text: «¡Su resolución brilla con todos los tonos del oro, hermana! Sus palabras arden como el fuego y su fe en ellas es inquebrantable... apenas puedo mirarla sin tener que cerrar los ojos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの決意はすべての影を金色に輝かせるのですね、シスター！その言葉は火のように燃えあがり、口にのぼる信仰は揺るぎない…正面から見据えるのが難しいほどです」
languages.original_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの決意はすべての影を金色に輝かせるのですね、シスター！その言葉は火のように燃えあがり、口にのぼる信仰は揺るぎない…正面から見据えるのが難しいほどです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Entschlossenheit glitzert in allen Schattierungen des Golds, Schwester! Eure Worte lodern wie ein Feuer, und Euer Glaube an das, was Ihr sagt, ist unerschütterlich ... Ich kann Euch kaum ansehen, ohne die Augen zusammenkneifen zu müssen."
languages.original_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Entschlossenheit glitzert in allen Schattierungen des Golds, Schwester! Eure Worte lodern wie ein Feuer, und Euer Glaube an das, was Ihr sagt, ist unerschütterlich ... Ich kann Euch kaum ansehen, ohne die Augen zusammenkneifen zu müssen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."

languages.text: "Kararlılığın, altının her tonuyla parıldıyor Rahibe! Sözlerin ateş gibi ışıldıyor, dediklerine de sarsılmaz bir inançla bağlısın... Karşındayken gözlerimi kısmadan duramıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Your resolve gleams with every shade of gold, Sister! Your words blaze like a fire, and your faith in what you say is unshakeable... I can barely behold it without squinting."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
